backend/main.mo: Main backend canister implementing access-controlled user profiles and post creation with visibility levels, storing posts and exposing queries for public or permitted access.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking regeneration preview functionality to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style list summarizing all frontend files and components, describing their roles in routing, UI, and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with OKLCH color variables and dark mode theme definitions.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point defining meta tags, icons, manifest, and the root mounting element.
frontend/public/.ic-assets.json5: Asset canister configuration setting cache headers, routing behavior, and raw access rules.
frontend/public/404.html: Redirect shim capturing the original path and forwarding to the SPA entry point.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, colors, and display mode.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker providing caching, offline shell support, and network-first navigation handling.
frontend/PUBLISHING.md: Documentation explaining deployment, preview regeneration, and PWA installation steps for the app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, theme provider, and main layout, defining routes for feed, post detail, new post, and pricing pages.
Displays the logged‑in user's name or shortened principal using Internet Identity and profile query data.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the top navigation bar with logo, pricing link, install button, auth status, and login controls.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps the app with header, footer, offline notice, and global profile-setup modal around page content.
frontend/src/components/posts/ImageCropp: Allows users to drag and crop an uploaded image and returns a cropped blob via canvas processing.
frontend/src/components/posts/ImageZoomV: Provides a modal viewer with zoom, pan, and reset controls for viewing images at high resolution.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Displays a writing post preview with image, badges, title, message snippet, and navigation to the post page.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostVisibi: Shows a badge indicating whether a post is private or link‑only, hiding for public posts.
frontend/src/components/posts/WritingTyp: Renders a badge showing whether a post is poetry or prose using appropriate icons.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Prompts new authenticated users to enter their name and saves the profile via mutation before continuing.
frontend/src/components/pwa/InstallAppBu: Provides a PWA install button that triggers the beforeinstallprompt when available and shows manual install instructions as fallback.
frontend/src/components/pwa/OfflineNotic: Displays an alert when the user is offline by listening to online/offline events.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for loading, logging in, and managing user identities via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating posts and user profiles using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode styles, and custom utilities like paper textures and manuscript frames.
frontend/src/lib/imageCrop.ts: Crops an image file using canvas based on given coordinates and returns the result as a Blob.
frontend/src/lib/imageUpload.ts: Converts an image file to an ExternalBlob with optional progress tracking using FileReader.
frontend/src/lib/postPresentation.ts: Provides helpers to format author principals and human-readable timestamps for posts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Displays the feed of posts, handles loading state, and shows a grid of PostCards with a button to create new posts.
frontend/src/pages/NewPostPage.tsx: Provides a form for creating a new post with image upload, cropping, validation, and submission.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Shows a single post’s details with badges, author info, image zooming, and error handling for missing or private posts.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Renders subscription plan cards with pricing, features, and a subscribe button.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers a service worker, handles update detection, and periodically checks for new versions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining typography, colors, animations, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s high-level state including app description, schema/versioning, and a list of existing features with IDs, titles, synonyms, descriptions, and versions. Serves as a structured inventory of implemented frontend and backend capabilities for the React/IC PWA.
